title: Coronavirus: How long does it take to recover?
description: Recovery from Covid-19 can be a lengthy process, depending on how seriously people get the virus.
content:
Image copyrightGetty Images
Covid-19 only emerged at the end of 2019, but already there are signs it may take a long time for some patients to get back to full health.
